description:
This is an Android Application built on top of the MifosX platform and purely written in Java. This task is to remove hard-coded string in XML file.

Some XML file has hard-coded text. convert a hard-coded String to a string ressource.

 * For this task follow this link : https://github.com/openMF/android-client/issues/1188

Work should be submitted as a pull request.
name: Remove Hard-Code String
